org.terrier.compression.integer.codec

Class VIntCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.compression.integer.codec.IntegerCodec
      • org.terrier.compression.integer.codec.VIntCodec

  • public final class VIntCodec
extends IntegerCodec
    IntegerCoding implementation which uses Varible byte encoding. It leverages Hadoop VInt functions.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Matteo Catena
